trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法會叫用指定的成員，使用指定的繫結條件約束並符合指定的引數清單、 修飾詞和文化特性。</xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> containing the name of the constructor, method, property, or field member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>包含名稱的建構函式、 方法、 屬性或欄位成員，才能叫用。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: -or- An empty string ("") to invoke the default member.
trans-unit.target: -空字串 ("") 來叫用的預設成員。

trans-unit.source: -or- For IDispatch members, a string representing the DispID, for example "[DispID=3]".
trans-unit.target: -的 IDispatch 成員，例如表示 DispID 的字串"[DispID =&3;]"。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，由一或多個<xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref>旗標會指定執行搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: The access can be one of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_BindingFlags" name="BindingFlags" href=""></xref> such as <xref uid="langword_csharp_Public" name="Public" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_NonPublic" name="NonPublic" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Private" name="Private" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_InvokeMethod" name="InvokeMethod" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetField" name="GetField" href=""></xref>, and so on.
trans-unit.target: The access can be one of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_BindingFlags" name="BindingFlags" href=""></xref> such as <xref uid="langword_csharp_Public" name="Public" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_NonPublic" name="NonPublic" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Private" name="Private" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_InvokeMethod" name="InvokeMethod" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetField" name="GetField" href=""></xref>, and so on.

trans-unit.source: The type of lookup need not be specified.
trans-unit.target: 不需要指定查閱的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the type of lookup is omitted, <xref uid="langword_csharp_BindingFlags.Public" name="BindingFlags.Public" href=""></xref> | <xref uid="langword_csharp_BindingFlags.Instance" name="BindingFlags.Instance" href=""></xref> will apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略查閱的類型，則<xref uid="langword_csharp_BindingFlags.Public" name="BindingFlags.Public" href=""> </xref> | <xref uid="langword_csharp_BindingFlags.Instance" name="BindingFlags.Instance" href=""> </xref>會套用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Reflection.Binder"></xref> object that defines a set of properties and enables binding, which can involve selection of an overloaded method, coercion of argument types, and invocation of a member through reflection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Reflection.Binder"> </xref>物件，定義一組屬性並啟用繫結，可包含類型的強制引數，以及透過反映的成員引動過程多載方法的選擇。

trans-unit.source: -or- <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, to use the <xref:System.Type.DefaultBinder*>.
trans-unit.target: -or- <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, to use the <xref:System.Type.DefaultBinder*>.</xref:System.Type.DefaultBinder*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> on which to invoke the specified member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要叫用指定的成員。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An array containing the arguments to pass to the member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 包含要傳遞給要叫用成員的引數的陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Reflection.ParameterModifier"></xref> objects representing the attributes associated with the corresponding element in the `args` array.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Reflection.ParameterModifier"></xref>表示中的對應項目相關聯的屬性物件`args`陣列。

trans-unit.source: A parameter's associated attributes are stored in the member's signature.
trans-unit.target: 參數的相關聯的屬性會儲存在成員的簽章。

trans-unit.source: The default binder does not process this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 預設繫結器不會處理這個參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the globalization locale to use, which may be necessary for locale-specific conversions, such as converting a numeric String to a Double.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件代表的全球化地區設定，若要使用，可能需要針對地區設定特定轉換，例如將數字的字串轉換成雙精度浮點數。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: -or- <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the current thread's <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>可使用目前執行緒的<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: An array containing the names of the parameters to which the values in the `args` array are passed.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，其中包含的參數名稱中的值`args`傳遞陣列。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the return value of the invoked member.
